bio: Michael Bowers has been working in high tech for over 25 years as an architect, developer, database administrator, and consultant. He is currently a principal engineer at the LDS Church. He has a Bachelors of Music Composition at Brigham Young University and an ABD PhD in Music Theory from Florida State University. He is the author of Pro CSS and HTML Design Patterns published by Apress in April 2007.
